Question: With the popularity of rap metal, this person formed a band called Methods of Mayhem.
Hints: This person released his autobiography, Tommyland and his second solo album, Tommyland: The Ride in 2005.
This person and Aero have been DJing together since 2000, and they will again have a major presence at Miami's WMC in 2008.
This person was also a guest DJ at WXRK "K-Rock" in New York during the Fourth of July Monster Metal Meltdown in 2005.
